Description: To verfiy C2C return is successful with valid MSISDN and PIN
To verify C2C Return is not successful if receiver channel user is barred as receiver
To verify C2C Return is not successful if sender channel user is barred as sender
To verify C2C Return is not successful if TCP of sender is suspended.
To verify C2C Return is not successful if TCP of receiver is suspended.
To verify C2C Return is not successful if transfer rule is suspended.
To verify C2C Return is not successful if receiver is insuspended.
To verify C2C Return is not successful if sender is outsuspended.
To verify C2C Return is successful if product code is blank
To verify C2C Return is not successful if Quantity is blank
To verify C2C Return is not successful if language code is invalid
To verify C2C Return is not successful if MSISDN2 is blank
To verify C2C Return is not successful if PIN is blank
To verify C2C Return is not successful if PIN invalid
To verify C2C Return is not successful if topup value is negative
